steps: Rinse the rice in a glass bowl. Mix with your hand until pour off until the water is clear. Drain into a hand strainer and let drop over the original bowl for five min for consistency
Place the rice and water in the instant pot and gently mix
Set to rice (low pressure for 12 minutes) # 1. When done, gently stir in the rice vinegar # 1. Spread the rice into a thin layer on a wooden cutting board and let cool for 10 minutes
title: Sushi Rice
